name: ScrapydWeb APP
description: How to set up Scrapyd cluster on Heroku

SCRAPYD_SERVER_1.description: You can add more Scrapyd servers in the web UI of Heroku after the APP is bulit, and the key of the environment variable should be like SCRAPYD_SERVER_n (n for a unique integer).

TZ.description: Timezone of the APP, get it via: python -c "import tzlocal; print(tzlocal.get_localzone())"

VERBOSE.description: The default is False, set it to True to change the logging level from WARNING to DEBUG.
